# Temptation (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |

| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |

| | *Krynn:* |  |

| | *Other:* | *Demon Lords:* Grazâ€™zt, [[Malcanthet]], Pazuzu |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Select a gender. As long as you wear no armor, you gain a +2 competence bonus on Charisma-based checks opposed by creatures of this gender. Furthermore, each save DC for any mind-affecting spells or abilities you use against this gender increases by 1.

**Temptation Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Charm Person (Spell)|Charm Person]]****:** Makes one person your friend.

**2** **[[Beckoning Call (Spell)|Beckoning Call]]****:** Lures target creature closer to you.

**3** **[[Suggestion (Spell)|Suggestion]]****:** Compels subject to follow stated course of action.

**4** **[[Charm Monster (Spell)|Charm Monster]]****:** Makes monster believe it is your ally.

**5** **[[Dominate Person (Spell)|Dominate Person]]****:** Controls humanoid telepathically.

**6** **[[Suggestion, Mass (Spell)|Mass Suggestion]]****:** As *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]*, plus one subject/level.

**7** **[[Soul Link (Spell)|Soul Link]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Grants target a boon, allows monitoring, and establishes a telepathic link that enhances enchantments.

**8** **[[Sympathy (Spell)|Sympathy]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Causes object or location to attract certain creatures.

**9** **[[Dominate Monster (Spell)|Dominate Monster]]****:** As *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]*, but any creature.

**Source:** Fiendish Codex I (WotC), pg. 90
